properties.name: disableDragAndDrop
properties.description: Allows to drag and drop items in the asset navigator. Default value: true.
properties.rawdescription:
Allows to drag and drop items in the asset navigator.
Default value: true.

properties.name: openOnStart
properties.description: Expands the root navigator node when the navigator is initialized. Default value: false
properties.rawdescription:
Expands the root navigator node when the navigator is initialized.
Default value: false

properties.name: rootNavigatorNode
properties.description:
Allows to override properies of the root group or hide it. Setup examples:

  • rootNavigatorNode: true - shows the default navigator node (default),
  • rootNavigatorNode: false - hides the navigator node,
  • rootNavigatorNode: { label: 'New name', ... } - overrides default navigator node,
  • rootNavigatorNode: new NavigatorNode({ label: 'New name', ... }) - overrides default navigator node,
properties.rawdescription:
Allows to override properies of the root group or hide it.
Setup examples:
- `rootNavigatorNode: true` - shows the default navigator node (default),
- `rootNavigatorNode: false` - hides the navigator node,
- `rootNavigatorNode: { label: 'New name', ... }` - overrides default navigator node,
- `rootNavigatorNode: new NavigatorNode({ label: 'New name', ... })` - overrides default navigator node,

properties.name: rootNodePriority
properties.description: Allows to change the position of the root group in the navigator. The higher the value, the higher the position in navigation. Default value: 2000.
properties.rawdescription:
Allows to change the position of the root group in the navigator.
The higher the value, the higher the position in navigation.
Default value: 2000.

properties.name: smartGroups
properties.description: Allows to enable smart groups in the module. Default value: false.
properties.rawdescription:
Allows to enable smart groups in the module.
Default value: false.
